content.en: Dialysis optimization: Researchers have developed algorithms that can accurately estimate and monitor the efficiency of hemodialysis treatments. These algorithms can calculate important parameters such as Kt/V and NPCR, providing a simple and accurate method for assessing dialysis adequacy. Additionally, algorithms can be used to determine rational dialysate sodium profiles, improving patient outcomes during hemodialysis.
content.da: Dialyseoptimering: Forskere har udviklet algoritmer, der nøjagtigt kan estimere og overvåge effektiviteten af hæmodialysebehandlinger. Disse algoritmer kan beregne vigtige parametre som Kt/V og NPCR, hvilket giver en enkel og præcis metode til at vurdere dialyseadækvathed. Derudover kan algoritmer bruges til at bestemme rationelle dialysat-natriumprofiler, hvilket forbedrer patientresultaterne under hæmodialyse.
